title: The Mongolian Village - Bells Corners - maybe closed
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Create your own stir fry and pay by the weight. Has vegan choices in protein, veggies, and sauces. You pick the ingredients and give to cooks to grill on a flat wok grill. Tell them you are vegan, and they will cook with different utensils. 10% discount for vegans and vegetarian meals. NOTE: maybe closed/shut down, please verify and let HappyCow know.
